definition: to tear open/to tear down/to tear apart/to open

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: So is it correct English to split infinitives?
sentences.chinese: 所以我的答案是可以拆分不定式。

sentences.english: Raceme separation is the main rout for preparation of pure enantiomers.
sentences.chinese: 外消旋体拆分是获得单一手性化合物的重要途径。

sentences.english: The currently agreed definition of homogeneous material introduces the concept of "mechanically disjointing".
sentences.chinese: 目前可接受的均质材料的定义包括机械拆分的概念。

sentences.english: Additionally, enthalpy and entropy both contributed to enantioseparation when mobile phase was acetonitrile.
sentences.chinese: 流动相为纯乙腈时，焓和熵对对映体的拆分均有贡献。

sentences.english: This article reviews some kinds of resolution methods of raceme based on membrane processes.
sentences.chinese: 本文综述了采用各种膜拆分外消旋体的研究进展。

sentences.english: Raceme resolution is the main route for preparation of chiral compounds.
sentences.chinese: 对外消旋体实施拆分是获得手性物质的重要途径。

sentences.english: This article reviews the present applications of cyclodextrins in chiral drug resolution.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了环糊精在手性药物拆分中的应用情况。

sentences.english: The extra space can reduce overflows and index page splits.
sentences.chinese: 额外的空间可以降低溢出和索引页拆分。

sentences.english: So, this interface must be split?
sentences.chinese: 那么这个接口必须拆分了？

sentences.english: We need to break up the too-big-to-fail banks;
sentences.chinese: 我们必须拆分这些庞大而不能倒闭的银行。

sentences.english: Chapter Four is on the synthesis and resolution of phenylalanine .
sentences.chinese: 第四章研究苯丙氨酸人工合成及拆分。

sentences.english: So, my answer is yes – it is OK to split infinitives.
sentences.chinese: 所以我的答案是可以拆分不定式。

sentences.english: After using, it can be folded in the spare time, occupying little room which is a great convenience for householders.
sentences.chinese: 闲置时还可拆分折叠收藏，占据空间很少，十分方便。

sentences.english: Note that the default is to have no file splitting.
sentences.chinese: 请注意，缺省情况下不进行文件拆分。

sentences.english: Enantiomer separation is one of the most important research fields of chiral technology.
sentences.chinese: 手性拆分是手性技术的重要研究方向。

sentences.english: The change of name will now pave the way for the demerger.
sentences.chinese: 现在名称的变更为拆分铺平了道路。

definition: to divide (into)/to split a bonus/to break into/tenths/percentage allotment
variant of 合併|合并[he2 bing4]
to peel/to strip/to peel off/to come off (of tissue, skin, covering etc)
to break up the whole into pieces (idiom); dealing with things one by one/divide and conquer
sum (result of addition)/addition/total/to add up a number of items/to accumulate
